item.title: rOpenSci
item.description: About rOpenSci rOpenSci fosters a culture that values open and reproducible research using shared data and reusable software My role in the community I’m part of the Multilingual Publishing Project, as a reviewer of the Dev Guide translations project to Spanish. I’m also one of the authors of the rOpenSci Localization and Translation Guidelines, that explains all the steps and tools involved in the localization of rOpenSci’s materials, including translations.
